p: Solid-phase micro-extraction (SPME) and Liquid-phase micro-extraction (LPME) are the most common and widespread pretreatment methodologies. LPME is an easy and user-friendly procedure, but it always takes time and involves vast amounts of samples and organic solvents [78]. The SPME approach is based on the fundamental concepts of sorbent analyte absorption or adsorption [55] and recent developments in this area are often concerned with the use of new sorbent materials [10].
